Description.Name: Basic BattlePods
Description.Details: This set of networked Battle Pods allow MechWarriors to compete against one another in simulated 'Mech battles, generating experience for participating MechWarriors. 20XP per day upto 10K XP and Pilots may gain one bonus Quirk.

AssignedCastDescription: Commander, have you seen these simulator pods? They're fantastic! I take back everything bad I've ever said about the Argo. Unfortunately, it will take about two years to train these greenhorns.
